comments: Amaryllis doraniae is named after J.L. Doran's mother.
examples: Amaryllis brasiliana H.P. Traub & J.L. Doran in Pl. Life 32: 40 (1976);  Hippeastrum wilsoniae F.W. Meyer & J.L. Doran in  Herbertia 43(1): 10 (1987)
source: IK. Autobiography in Plant Life, 28: 7-19 (1972). He uses the name Leonard  rather than John. The use of L.J. Leonard in Herbertia,43(1): 10 (1987) was a  'typographical error on the part of the journal', according to author via Dr Gandhi.
